description: The BR-34 District Transport Office (DTO) is the primary vehicle registration and licensing authority for the Khagaria district in Bihar, operating under the Munger Division. It manages essential transport services including vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and road tax collection for seven administrative blocks. The office plays a vital role in maintaining transport safety and compliance in this riverine district located at the confluence of the Ganga and Gandak rivers.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar
